data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Sean: Let me guess - you're planning to go to medical school.
Chris: Yes; how'd ____ know ____?
Sean: Most ____ year ____ at ____ university ____ the ____ plans. I ____ that ____ would ____ more ____ to ____ other ____. Many find out too late that they have other passions, that they would have enjoyed tackling if they had discovered them earlier.
data.partBlankContent:
Sean: Let me guess - you're planning to go to medical school.
Chris: Yes; how'd y__ know th__?
Sean: Most fi___ year stud____ at th__ university ha__ the sa__ plans. I wi__ that th__ would ta__ more ti__ to exp____ other opt____. Many find out too late that they have other passions, that they would have enjoyed tackling if they had discovered them earlier.
data.answer:
肖恩:让我猜猜——你打算上医学院。
克丽丝:是的;你怎么知道的?
肖恩:这所大学的大多数五年级学生都有同样的计划。我希望这能花更多的时间来探索其他选择。许多人发现自己还有其他爱好时已经太晚了，如果他们能早点发现这些爱好，他们会更加享受这一切。
